title: 2001년 Smith v. State 사건
summary: 미국 Missouri, MO 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Smith v. State. 판결일: 2001-05-22. 법원: Missouri Court of Appeals.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: James C. SMITH v. STATE of Missouri
**판결일**: 2001-05-22
**법원**: Missouri Court of Appeals
**관할**: Missouri, MO

**판사**: Howard, Smart, Stith

## 변호인

Mark A. Grothoff, Asst. Public Defender, Columbia, MO, for Appellant., Jeremiah W. (Jay) Nixon, Atty. Gen., Lisa M. Sutherland, Asst. Atty. Gen., Jefferson City, MO, for Respondent.

## 인용

- 48 S.W.3d 70

## 판결문 요약



ORDER

PER CURIAM.
Appellant James Smith appeals the denial of his postconviction motion to vacate judgment and sentence under Rule 29.15 of the Supreme Court Rules. He contends that his right to effective assistance of counsel was violated. He was convicted after a jury trial of burglary and possession of burglary tools. He contends that counsel was ineffective in failing to call him to testify in his own behalf, and in failing to object to leading questions asked on redirect exam of one of the state’s witnesses.
*71The judgment is affirmed. Rule 84.16(b).
